product_details.name: FitTrack Pro
product_details.description: A fitness tracking mobile app that helps users monitor workouts, nutrition, and wellness goals. Includes features for step counting, workout planning, and meal tracking.
product_details.currentFeatures: Step counter, Workout logger, Basic meal tracking, Weight tracking, Progress charts, Simple goal setting
product_details.targetMarket: Health-conscious individuals aged 25-45 who want to improve their fitness and track their progress
product_details.mainChallenges: User retention is low after 30 days, Limited social features, Basic analytics, No integration with other health apps

suggestions.title: Enhanced Social Features
suggestions.description: Integrate social features like friend challenges, leaderboards, and group activity tracking.

suggestions.title: Advanced Analytics and Progress Reporting
suggestions.description: Provide detailed analytics dashboards visualizing progress, identifying trends, and offering personalized insights.

suggestions.title: Third-Party App Integrations
suggestions.description: Integrate with popular health and fitness apps (e.g., Apple Health, Google Fit, MyFitnessPal).

suggestions.title: Gamification and Rewards System
suggestions.description: Implement a gamified experience with badges, achievements, and rewards to motivate users.

trends: Increased demand for personalized fitness tracking
Growing popularity of social fitness and challenges
Focus on data-driven insights and personalized recommendations
competitor_activities: Integration with other health apps is a common feature among competitors
Many fitness apps use gamification to improve user retention
Advanced analytics and personalized feedback are becoming standard
